name: The Minotaur (itch)
description:
As Theseus, you enter the labyrinth of Daedelus, solving puzzles while on a quest to slay the Minotaur.

This 10-25 minute game, built in Ren'Py, was created as an entry in the Historically Accurate Game Jam 2021. It includes a mix of visual puzzles and variations on the classic Knights & Knaves scenario.

A web version can be found here (note the performance in the downloadable versions is slightly better than the web version):  https://the-minotaur.netlify.app/
